</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Selects the item with the given index in the listbox, listnbox, combobox, xcombobox, xlistbox<br>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> important </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> '''The following only applicable to Alternative Syntax when used with [[CT_LISTBOX]] and [[CT_LISTNBOX]]'''<br>To deselect all entries, use -1: <tt>_ctrl [[lbSetCurSel]] -1;</tt> For listbox of style LB_MULTI use [[lbSetSelected]] instead.<br>[[CT_COMBO]] does not allow unselecting entries, instead it will select the first one. If you really need to unselect a combobox then follow these steps:<br>
# Are you really really sure you want to unselect a combobox? This behavior is inconsistent with the usual functionality of a combobox.
# Read the note from [[#Notes|DreadedEntity]] below.</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''lbSetCurSel''' [idc, index]
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [idc, index]: [[Array]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]] of control
</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> index: [[Number]]
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> control '''lbSetCurSel''' index

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> control: [[Control]]
</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> index: [[Number]]
</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[lbSetCurSel]] [101, 0];</code>
		  
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_control [[lbSetCurSel]] 0;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[lbAdd]], [[lbClear]], [[lbColor]], [[lbCurSel]], [[lbData]], [[lbDelete]], [[lbIsSelected]], [[lbPicture]], [[lbSelection]], [[lbSetColor]], [[lbSetData]], [[lbSetPicture]], [[lbSetSelected]], [[lbSetTooltip]], [[lbSetValue]], [[lbSize]], [[lbSort]], [[lbSortByValue]], [[lbText]], [[lbValue]]
